title: Alliances
content: Alliances are groups of players that work together towards a common goal. The size of alliances can vary greatly from 2 to 20+ players. Alliances also have different objectives such as survival, defense, or raiding. Some alliances are well-structured, with clear leaders and objectives, while others may be loose groups with no player being in charge. More loosely-formed groups may elect a temporary leader to represent them in negotiations or trade.

sections.title: Common Goals/Objectives
sections.content:
Survival
Defense
Trade
Raiding
Law-Enforcement/Government
Building Player-Made Cities or Towns
Recreation (Trolling)
